Игра CS:GO, игра без смысла в общем, но просто как трата времени подойдёт.

It's overall a nice game, the gameplay experience is fun and complete. Sure, mm and soloq can suck, there are still many bugs even after 8 years, and valve is valve when it comes to updates, but that just adds to the overall charm. Such a stupid and silly game sometimes and i love it. <3
